title: Shattered Relics League/Fragments

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fragments are the result of The Sage shattering relics into fragments and scattering them across Gielinor. Fragments are weaker in isolation, compared to relics of previous leagues but they can be combined to form very powerful set effects. Players are limited to a set amount of active fragments at a time, up to a maximum of seven, but they can be exchanged while inside a bank, near a bank chest, or near The Sage.

content:
Interface for equipping fragments.

Fragments are the result of The Sage shattering relics into fragments and scattering them across Gielinor. Fragments are weaker in isolation, compared to relics of previous leagues but they can be combined to form very powerful set effects. Players are limited to a set amount of active fragments at a time, up to a maximum of seven, but they can be exchanged while inside a bank, near a bank chest, or near The Sage.

Contents

  • 1 Obtaining fragments
    • 1.1 Slots and passives
    • 1.2 Fragment levels
    • 1.3 Combat Tiers
  • 2 Fragment list
  • 3 Set effects
  • 4 References

Obtaining fragments[edit | edit source]

Fragments can be collected from skilling, bossing, clue scrolls, and other activities. Most fragments are obtained through RNG means. The chance to acquire a fragment is based on activity and is scaled by the amount of XP acquired.[1] The activity type also corresponds to the pool of obtainable fragments. For example, while players are Fishing, only fishing-related fragments are unlockable. Combat fragments are unlocked using any combat style, and are organised into tiers that correspond to difficulty. Higher tiered combat fragments are only obtained by attempting difficult content such as Fight Caves or high level bosses. Fragments are dropped to the floor when receiving one with a full inventory.

Slots and passives[edit | edit source]

The number of equipped fragments is limited by the number of fragment slots that a player has unlocked by completing tasks. When each new fragment tier is achieved, one fragment slot and one relic passive are unlocked.

Fragment levels[edit | edit source]

Each fragment has one base effect and two set effects. The base effect of fragments have levels that increase the base effect. Gaining any experience in any unlocked skill while the fragment is equipped will gain 1 XP, at a maximum of one per 4 ticks.[2] Obtaining a duplicate fragment also grants 500 experience for that fragment, even if it is not currently equipped. Fragments are removed from the potential drop table when their base level has reached the maximum level.

Combat Tiers[edit | edit source]

Combat fragments have four tiers, labelled as tiers 1-4 on the table below.

Tier 1 fragments are dropped by most normal NPCs, and tier 2 fragments are awarded from lower level PvM content, such as Dagannoth Kings and Barrows. Meanwhile, tier 3 fragments are obtained from mid-game content, such as The Gauntlet, Kraken, and Zulrah. Lastly, tier 4 fragments are dropped by other bosses such as from the TzHaar Fight Cave, God Wars Dungeon Bosses, and the Theatre of Blood.

Reaching tier 3 in league points grants a random tier 1 combat fragment, tier 5 grants a random tier 2 combat fragment, and tier 7 grants a random tier 3 combat fragment.

Combat tier Dropped by
1 Most normal NPCs, as well as Bryophyta, Chasm crawler, Crushing hand, Giant Mole, Grotesque Guardians, The Mimic, Obor, Screaming banshee, Screaming twisted banshee
2 Barrows, Bryophyta, Dagannoth Kings, Giant Mole, Grotesque Guardians, Hespori, The Mimic, Obor, Sarachnis, Skotizo

Superior slayer monsters: Chasm crawler, Cockathrice, Crushing hand, Flaming pyrelord, Giant rockslug, Infernal pyrelord, Monstrous basilisk, Screaming banshee, Screaming twisted banshee

3 Abyssal sire, Cerberus, The Gauntlet, Kalphite Queen, King black dragon, Kraken, Thermonuclear smoke devil, Vorkath, Zulrah

Superior slayer monsters: Abhorrent spectre, Basilisk Sentinel, Cave abomination, Choke devil, Colossal Hydra, Greater abyssal demon, Guardian Drake, Insatiable Bloodveld, Insatiable mutated Bloodveld, King kurask, Marble gargoyle, Nechryarch, Night beast, Nuclear smoke devil, Repugnant spectre, Shadow Wyrm, Spiked Turoth, Vitreous Jelly, Vitreous warped Jelly

4 Alchemical Hydra, Chambers of Xeric, Corporeal Beast, Fight Caves, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Inferno, The Nightmare, Phosani's Nightmare, Theatre of Blood

Fragment list[edit | edit source]

Fragment Type Level Effects Set Effect 1 Set Effect 2
Alchemaniac Skilling Players will receive 15/30/50% extra coins when casting High Level Alchemy on items. Endless Knowledge Personal Banker
Arcane Conduit Combat (T1) Runes and magic weapon charges have a 40/60/90% chance to be saved. Endless Knowledge Trailblazer
Armadylean Decree Combat (T4) When wielding four Armadylean items, enchanted bolt effects have a 25/50/100% increased chance to activate. Double Tap Absolute Unit
Bandosian Might Combat (T4) When wielding four Bandosian items, the player's max melee hit is increased by 1/2/4 for every attack speed a weapon has. Twin Strikes Fast Metabolism
Barbarian Pest Wars Miscellaneous Reward currency earned for playing the following minigames are increased by x2/x3/x4:
  • Honour points from Barbarian Assault
  • Commendation points from Pest Control
  • Zeal Tokens from Soul Wars
 Twin Strikes Knife's Edge
Bottomless Quiver Combat (T1) Ranged ammunition and ranged weapon charges have a 40/60/90% chance to be saved, excluding chinchompas.

The chances to save ammunition and charges are rolled separately.

Knife's Edge Trailblazer
Catch Of The Day Harvesting All types of Fishing activities have a 1 in 300/200/80 chance, per catch, to roll the rare drop table once. Personal Banker Unchained Talent
Certified Farmer Harvesting Farming yields have a 25/50/100% chance to be doubled, and are converted to bank notes upon harvest. Greedy Gatherer The Alchemist
Chef's Catch Harvesting Players have a 20/35/50% chance of cooking a raw fish upon catching them. Cooking experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to cook them normally. Greedy Gatherer Trailblazer
Chinchonkers Harvesting Catching chinchompas grant 50/100/100% more Hunter experience. At level 3, players will receive two chinchompas per successful capture. Double Tap Last Recall
Clued In Miscellaneous The drop rate of scroll boxes from NPCs are increased to 1 in 30/25/15. Last Recall Drakan's Touch
Deeper Pockets Skilling Players have a 20/50/100% chance to receive double loot when pickpocketing NPCs. This stacks multiplicatively with rogue equipment. Chain Magic Personal Banker
Dine & Dash Production Players have a 10/20/50% chance to receive an extra piece of cooked food while cooking.

Though no extra Cooking experience is gained when this occurs, the extra food is automatically sent to the player's bank.

The Alchemist Unchained Talent
Divine Restoration Combat (T3) Players will have their prayer points restored by one every 15/9/3.6 seconds. Absolute Unit Twin Strikes
Dragon On A Bit Production Players have a 10/20/40% chance to save the materials used whilst crafting dragonhide armour.

The saved materials are automatically sent to the player's bank.

The Craftsman Absolute Unit
Enchanted Jeweler Skilling Each enchantment spell cast will enchant up to 5/10/25 pieces of jewellery, granting the full Magic experience. Last Recall Endless Knowledge
Golden Brick Road Skilling When a mark of grace appears when training on a Rooftop Agility Course, 4,000/7,000/15,000 coins will appear alongside it. The Alchemist Trailblazer
Grave Robber Skilling The amount of hallowed marks received when looting coffins within the Hallowed Sepulchre is increased by 50/150/300%. Fast Metabolism The Craftsman
Homewrecker Harvesting Players have a x2/x3/x4 chance of receiving bird nests when chopping trees, and are sent to the bank rather than falling to the ground. The Alchemist Last Recall
Hot On The Trail Skilling Players have a 2/5/10% chance to obtain a scroll box whilst lighting logs via Firemaking. Fast Metabolism Chain Magic
Imcando's Apprentice Production Players have a 20/50/75% chance to craft an extra piece of gemmed jewellery, granting Crafting experience for the extra jewellery.

Note that players must have spare inventory space to obtain the extra jewellery.

The Craftsman Chain Magic
Just Druid! Production Players will receive 10/20/40% extra Herblore experience for each grimy herb cleaned. The Alchemist Greedy Gatherer
Larger Recharger Combat (T3) Players will have their special attack energy restored by 10% every 25/20/10 seconds. Fast Metabolism Drakan's Touch
Livin' On A Prayer Combat (T3) The drain rate of activated prayers are reduced by 15/30/60%. Knife's Edge Twin Strikes
Message In A Bottle Miscellaneous The chance of receiving clue geodes, nests, and bottles from skilling are increased by x3/x5/x10. Knife's Edge Greedy Gatherer
Mixologist Production Players will have a 25/50/100% chance to mix a 4-dose potion rather than a 3-dose potion, with a 20/50/100% chance to save the secondary ingredient. The Alchemist Unchained Talent
Molten Miner Harvesting If applicable, ores mined have a 20/50/100% chance to be smelted into bars. Smithing experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to smelt them normally. Greedy Gatherer Personal Banker
Mother's Magic Fossils Miscellaneous
  • The chance of receiving golden nuggets from the Motherlode Mine is increased by x2/x3/x4.
  • The amount of pizazz points received from activities in the Mage Training Arena is increased by x2/x3/x4.
  • The chance of receiving fossils from activities on Fossil Island is increased by x2/x3/x4.
 Chain Magic Endless Knowledge
Plank Stretcher Production Players will have a 10/20/50% chance to save their planks whilst training Construction. Unchained Talent Endless Knowledge
Praying Respects Skilling Remains are automatically buried/scattered, granting 50/100/200% of the usual Prayer experience. League experience multipliers are applied. Knife's Edge Drakan's Touch
Pro Tips Production Players will receive 30/50/100% more bolt tips per gem whilst making them. The Craftsman Double Tap
Profletchional Production Fletching logs and stringing bows grant 30/50/100% more Fletching experience. The Craftsman Last Recall
Rock Solid Harvesting Iron, sandstone, and granite rocks have a 25/50/75% chance to not be depleted upon being mined. Greedy Gatherer Fast Metabolism
Rogues' Chompy Farm Miscellaneous
  • The chance of successfully cracking the wall safe at the end of the Rogues' Den maze is increased by 10/20/40%.
  • Each chompy bird killed will count as 2/3/4 kills when checking chompy kill-count via the ogre bow.
  • The amount of points earned from the Tithe Farm is increased by x2/x3/x4.
 Double Tap Unchained Talent
Rooty Tooty 2x Runeys Production Players have a 20/40/80% chance to receive an extra rune for each rune crafted. Last Recall Chain Magic
Rumple-Bow-String Production The Spin Flax spell gives 10/15/27 bow strings instead of the usual 5. The Craftsman Double Tap
Rune Escape Production Players will no longer receive mind (lv-1)/body (lv-2)/elemental runes (lv-3) when crafting runes at the Ourania Altar. Last Recall Absolute Unit
Saradominist Defence Combat (T4) When wielding four Saradominist items, the player's max hit is increased by 2/5/10 if they have taken damage in the last 3.6 seconds. Absolute Unit Knife's Edge
Seedy Business Harvesting Players have a 10/25/50% chance to save their seed upon planting it in a farming patch. Personal Banker Trailblazer
Slash & Burn Harvesting Players have a 20/35/50% chance of burning logs upon chopping them. Firemaking experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to burn them normally. Greedy Gatherer Unchained Talent
Slay 'n' Pay Combat (T1) Players will earn 10/20/50% more slayer reward points upon completing a slayer task. Twin Strikes Last Recall
Slay All Day Combat (T2) Players will heal 1/2/3 hitpoints for every monster killed as part of a slayer task. Knife's Edge The Alchemist
Smithing Double Production Players have a 5/15/30% chance to smith an extra item when smithing items at an anvil, granting Smithing experience for the extra item. Extra items will drop to the floor if players have no inventory space. Personal Banker Double Tap
Smooth Criminal Skilling The chance to successfully pickpocket NPCs is increased by 15/25/50%. At level 2, players will no longer take damage when stunned by a failed pickpocket attempt.

The gloves of silence and Ardougne Diary bonus will stack.

Trailblazer Last Recall
Special Discount Combat (T2) Special attacks whose energy cost is greater than 50/40/25% will cost 50/40/25% energy instead. Twin Strikes Drakan's Touch
Superior Tracking Combat (T3) Superior slayer monsters have a 1 in 150/100/30 chance of spawning during a slayer task for eligible slayer monsters. Last Recall Absolute Unit
Tactical Duelist Combat (T2) Melee weapon charges have a 20/40/80% chance to be saved. Twin Strikes Absolute Unit
Thrall Damage Combat (T2) The max hit of thralls are increased by x2/x3/x4. Damage is rounded up. Chain Magic Endless Knowledge
Unholy Ranger Combat (T1) The player's accuracy for ranged weapons is increased by 30/60/100% when they have no prayer points remaining. Excludes the dwarf multicannon. Double Tap Drakan's Touch
Unholy Warrior Combat (T1) The player's accuracy for melee weapons is increased by 12/20/30% when they have no prayer points remaining. Knife's Edge Trailblazer
Unholy Wizard Combat (T1) The player's accuracy for magic attacks is increased by 40/70/125% when they have no prayer points remaining. Chain Magic Drakan's Touch
Venomaster Combat (T1) The player's attacks have a chance to inflict poison that starts at 3/5/7 damage. Players will gain poison immunity at level 2, and venom immunity at level 3. Fast Metabolism Absolute Unit
Zamorakian Sight Combat (T4) When wielding four Zamorakian items, the player's accuracy for magic attacks is increased by 50/125/250%. Chain Magic Drakan's Touch

rawContent:
[[File:Shattered Relics League fragments interface.png|thumb|Interface for equipping fragments.]]
'''Fragments''' are the result of [[The Sage]] shattering relics into fragments and scattering them across [[Gielinor]]. Fragments are weaker in isolation, compared to relics of previous leagues but they can be combined to form very powerful set effects. Players are limited to a set amount of active fragments at a time, up to a maximum of seven, but they can be exchanged while inside a [[bank]], near a [[bank chest]], or near The Sage.

==Obtaining fragments==
Fragments can be collected from skilling, bossing, [[Treasure Trails|clue scrolls]], and other activities. Most fragments are obtained through [[RNG]] means. The chance to acquire a fragment is based on activity and is scaled by the amount of [[XP]] acquired.{{CiteVideo|title=Shattered Relics League & Nex! Mods Arcane, Flippy & Oasis - OSRS Q&A September 30th|author=Jagex|url=8FsXF2MIcOs&t=420s|timestamp=7:00|date=4. October 2021|site=YouTube}} The activity type also corresponds to the pool of obtainable fragments. For example, while players are [[Fishing]], only fishing-related fragments are unlockable. Combat fragments are unlocked using any combat style, and are organised into tiers that correspond to difficulty. Higher tiered combat fragments are only obtained by attempting difficult content such as [[Fight Caves]] or high level [[bosses]]. Fragments are dropped to the floor when receiving one with a full inventory.

===Slots and passives===
The number of equipped fragments is limited by the number of fragment slots that a player has unlocked by completing tasks. When each new fragment tier is achieved, one fragment slot and one relic passive are  unlocked.

===Fragment levels===
Each fragment has one base effect and two set effects. The base effect of fragments have levels that increase the base effect. Gaining any experience in any unlocked skill while the fragment is equipped will gain 1 XP, at a maximum of one per 4 [[tick|ticks]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Flippy|url=https://twitter.com/JagexFlippy/status/1448682590408486913|date=14 October 2021|archiveurl=https://twitter.com/JagexFlippy/status/1448682590408486913|quote=Base effects level up at a flat rate each time you gain xp (time-gated by x ticks)}} Obtaining a duplicate fragment also grants 500 experience for that fragment, even if it is not currently equipped. Fragments are removed from the potential drop table when their base level has reached the maximum level.

=== Combat Tiers ===
Combat fragments have four tiers, labelled as tiers 1-4 on the table below.

Tier 1 fragments are dropped by most normal NPCs, and tier 2 fragments are awarded from lower level PvM content, such as [[Dagannoth Kings]] and [[Barrows]]. Meanwhile, tier 3 fragments are obtained from mid-game content, such as [[The Gauntlet]], [[Kraken]], and [[Zulrah]]. Lastly, tier 4 fragments are dropped by other bosses such as from the [[TzHaar Fight Cave]], [[God Wars Dungeon|God Wars Dungeon Bosses]], and the [[Theatre of Blood]].

Reaching tier 3 in league points grants a random tier 1 combat fragment, tier 5 grants a random tier 2 combat fragment, and tier 7 grants a random tier 3 combat fragment.

==Fragment list==

! style="width:15%;" | Set Effect 2
|-
|{{plinkt|Alchemaniac}}
|Skilling
|Players will receive 15/30/50% extra [[coins]] when casting [[High Level Alchemy]] on items.
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|[[Personal Banker]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Arcane Conduit}}
|Combat (T1)
|Runes and magic weapon charges have a 40/60/90% chance to be saved.
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Armadylean Decree}}
|Combat (T4)
|When wielding four [[Armadyl]]ean items, [[enchanted bolt]] effects have a 25/50/100% increased chance to activate.
|[[Double Tap]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Bandosian Might}}
|Combat (T4)
|When wielding four [[Bandos]]ian items, the player's max melee hit is increased by 1/2/4 for every [[attack speed]] a weapon has.
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Barbarian Pest Wars}}
|Miscellaneous
|Reward currency earned for playing the following [[minigames]] are increased by x2/x3/x4:
* [[Honour points]] from [[Barbarian Assault]]
* [[Commendation points]] from [[Pest Control]]
* [[Zeal Tokens]] from [[Soul Wars]]
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Bottomless Quiver}}
|Combat (T1)
|Ranged ammunition and ranged weapon charges have a 40/60/90% chance to be saved, excluding [[Chinchompa (weapon)|chinchompas]].

The chances to save ammunition and charges are rolled separately.
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Catch Of The Day}}
|Harvesting
|All types of [[Fishing]] activities have a 1 in 300/200/80 chance, per catch, to roll the [[rare drop table]] once.
|[[Personal Banker]]
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Certified Farmer}}
|Harvesting
|[[Farming]] yields have a 25/50/100% chance to be doubled, and are converted to [[bank note]]s upon harvest.
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|[[The Alchemist]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Chef's Catch}}
|Harvesting
|Players have a 20/35/50% chance of cooking a raw fish upon catching them. [[Cooking]] experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to cook them normally.
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Chinchonkers}}
|Harvesting
|Catching [[Chinchompa (disambiguation)|chinchompas]] grant 50/100/100% more [[Hunter]] experience. At level 3, players will receive two chinchompas per successful capture.
|[[Double Tap]]
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Clued In}}
|Miscellaneous
|The [[drop rate]] of [[scroll box]]es from NPCs are increased to 1 in 30/25/15.
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Deeper Pockets}}
|Skilling
|Players have a 20/50/100% chance to receive double loot when [[pickpocketing]] [[NPC]]s. This stacks multiplicatively with [[rogue equipment]].
|[[Chain Magic]]
|[[Personal Banker]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Dine & Dash}}
|Production
|Players have a 10/20/50% chance to receive an extra piece of cooked food while cooking.

Though no extra [[Cooking]] experience is gained when this occurs, the extra food is automatically sent to the player's [[bank]].
|[[The Alchemist]]
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Divine Restoration}}
|Combat (T3)
|Players will have their [[prayer points]] restored by one every 15/9/3.6 seconds.
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Dragon On A Bit}}
|Production
|Players have a 10/20/40% chance to save the materials used whilst crafting [[dragonhide armour]].

The saved materials are automatically sent to the player's [[bank]].
|[[The Craftsman]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Enchanted Jeweler}}
|Skilling
|Each [[enchantment spell]] cast will enchant up to 5/10/25 pieces of jewellery, granting the full [[Magic]] experience.
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Golden Brick Road}}
|Skilling
|When a [[mark of grace]] appears when training on a [[Rooftop Agility Course]], 4,000/7,000/15,000 [[coins]] will appear alongside it.
|[[The Alchemist]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Grave Robber}}
|Skilling
|The amount of [[hallowed mark]]s received when looting [[Coffin (Hallowed Sepulchre)|coffins]] within the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]] is increased by 50/150/300%.
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|[[The Craftsman]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Homewrecker}}
|Harvesting
|Players have a x2/x3/x4 chance of receiving [[bird nest]]s when chopping trees, and are sent to the [[bank]] rather than falling to the ground.
|[[The Alchemist]]
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Hot On The Trail}}
|Skilling
|Players have a 2/5/10% chance to obtain a [[scroll box]] whilst lighting logs via [[Firemaking]].
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|[[Chain Magic]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Imcando's Apprentice}}
|Production
|Players have a 20/50/75% chance to craft an extra piece of gemmed [[jewellery]], granting [[Crafting]] experience for the extra jewellery.

Note that players must have spare inventory space to obtain the extra jewellery.
|[[The Craftsman]]
|[[Chain Magic]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Just Druid!}}
|Production
|Players will receive 10/20/40% extra [[Herblore]] experience for each [[grimy herb]] cleaned.
|[[The Alchemist]]
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Larger Recharger}}
|Combat (T3)
|Players will have their [[special attack]] energy restored by 10% every 25/20/10 seconds.
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Livin' On A Prayer}}
|Combat (T3)
|The drain rate of activated [[prayer]]s are reduced by 15/30/60%.
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Message In A Bottle}}
|Miscellaneous
|The chance of receiving [[clue geode]]s, [[clue nest|nests]], and [[Clue bottle|bottles]] from skilling are increased by x3/x5/x10.
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Mixologist}}
|Production
|Players will have a 25/50/100% chance to mix a 4-dose potion rather than a 3-dose potion, with a 20/50/100% chance to save the secondary ingredient.
|[[The Alchemist]]
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Molten Miner}}
|Harvesting
|If applicable, ores mined have a 20/50/100% chance to be smelted into bars. [[Smithing]] experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to smelt them normally.
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|[[Personal Banker]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Mother's Magic Fossils}}
|Miscellaneous
|
* The chance of receiving [[golden nugget]]s from the [[Motherlode Mine]] is increased by x2/x3/x4.
* The amount of [[pizazz points]] received from activities in the [[Mage Training Arena]] is increased by x2/x3/x4.
* The chance of receiving [[Fossil Island fossil|fossil]]s from activities on [[Fossil Island]] is increased by x2/x3/x4.
|[[Chain Magic]]
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Plank Stretcher}}
|Production
|Players will have a 10/20/50% chance to save their [[planks]] whilst training [[Construction]].
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Praying Respects}}
|Skilling
|[[Remains]] are automatically buried/scattered, granting 50/100/200% of the usual [[Prayer]] experience. League experience multipliers are applied.
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Pro Tips}}
|Production
|Players will receive 30/50/100% more [[bolt tips]] per [[gem]] whilst making them.
|[[The Craftsman]]
|[[Double Tap]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Profletchional}}
|Production
|Fletching logs and stringing bows grant 30/50/100% more [[Fletching]] experience.
|[[The Craftsman]]
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Rock Solid}}
|Harvesting
|[[Iron rock|Iron]], [[Sandstone rock|sandstone]], and [[granite rock]]s have a 25/50/75% chance to not be depleted upon being mined.
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Rogues' Chompy Farm}}
|Miscellaneous
|
* The chance of successfully cracking the [[wall safe]] at the end of the [[Rogues' Den]] maze is increased by 10/20/40%.
* Each [[chompy bird]] killed will count as 2/3/4 kills when checking chompy kill-count via the [[ogre bow]].
* The amount of points earned from the [[Tithe Farm]] is increased by x2/x3/x4.
|[[Double Tap]]
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Rooty Tooty 2x Runeys}}
|Production
|Players have a 20/40/80% chance to receive an extra rune for each rune crafted.
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|[[Chain Magic]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Rumple-Bow-String}}
|Production
|The [[Spin Flax]] spell gives 10/15/27 [[bow string]]s instead of the usual 5.
|[[The Craftsman]]
|[[Double Tap]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Rune Escape}}
|Production
|Players will no longer receive [[mind rune|mind]] (lv-1)/[[Body rune|body]] (lv-2)/[[elemental rune]]s (lv-3) when crafting runes at the [[Ourania Altar]].
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Saradominist Defence}}
|Combat (T4)
|When wielding four [[Saradomin]]ist items, the player's max hit is increased by 2/5/10 if they have taken damage in the last 3.6 seconds.
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Seedy Business}}
|Harvesting
|Players have a 10/25/50% chance to save their [[seed]] upon planting it in a farming patch.
|[[Personal Banker]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Slash & Burn}}
|Harvesting
|Players have a 20/35/50% chance of burning logs upon chopping them. [[Firemaking]] experience is granted, even if players do not have the level required to burn them normally.
|[[Greedy Gatherer]]
|[[Unchained Talent]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Slay 'n' Pay}}
|Combat (T1)
|Players will earn 10/20/50% more [[slayer reward point]]s upon completing a [[slayer task]].
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Slay All Day}}
|Combat (T2)
|Players will heal 1/2/3 [[hitpoints]] for every monster killed as part of a [[slayer task]].
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[The Alchemist]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Smithing Double}}
|Production
|Players have a 5/15/30% chance to smith an extra item when smithing items at an [[anvil]], granting [[Smithing]] experience for the extra item. Extra items will drop to the floor if players have no inventory space.
|[[Personal Banker]]
|[[Double Tap]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Smooth Criminal}}
|Skilling
|The chance to successfully [[pickpocket]] [[NPC]]s is increased by 15/25/50%. At level 2, players will no longer take damage when [[Stun (status)|stunned]] by a failed pickpocket attempt.

The [[gloves of silence]] and [[Ardougne Diary]] bonus will stack.
|[[Trailblazer]]
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Special Discount}}
|Combat (T2)
|[[Special attacks]] whose energy cost is greater than 50/40/25% will cost 50/40/25% energy instead.
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Superior Tracking}}
|Combat (T3)
|[[Superior slayer monster]]s have a 1 in 150/100/30 chance of spawning during a [[slayer task]] for eligible [[slayer monsters]].
|[[Last Recall (Shattered Relics)|Last Recall]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Tactical Duelist}}
|Combat (T2)
|Melee weapon charges have a 20/40/80% chance to be saved. 
|[[Twin Strikes]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Thrall Damage}}

|The max hit of [[thrall]]s are increased by x2/x3/x4. Damage is rounded up.
|[[Chain Magic]]
|[[Endless Knowledge]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Unholy Ranger}}
|Combat (T1)
|The player's accuracy for ranged weapons is increased by 30/60/100% when they have no [[prayer points]] remaining. Excludes the [[dwarf multicannon]].
|[[Double Tap]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Unholy Warrior}}
|Combat (T1)
|The player's accuracy for melee weapons is increased by 12/20/30% when they have no [[prayer points]] remaining.
|[[Knife's Edge]]
|[[Trailblazer]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Unholy Wizard}}
|Combat (T1)
|The player's accuracy for magic attacks is increased by 40/70/125% when they have no [[prayer points]] remaining.
|[[Chain Magic]]
|[[Drakan's Touch]]
|-
|{{plinkt|Venomaster}}
|Combat (T1)
|The player's attacks have a chance to inflict [[poison]] that starts at 3/5/7 damage. Players will gain [[poison]] immunity at level 2, and [[venom]] immunity at level 3.
|[[Fast Metabolism]]
|[[Absolute Unit]]
